data.message: Soooo, instead of "when u comin to ....?" or "Shady you need to visit ...!" How bout you just need to drop all your shit, take a break from rapping, and come hang out with me!!!!! You need to be a regular Human once in a while!  ;)

Nooo you wouldn't if he showed up at your door you'd flip I know I would
